I wrote a small extension to JUnit that provides access to a test data
repository. It allows to separate test data from test code.

You can find out more about it at <http://repo.sourceforge.net/>.

Please let me know what you think.
Thanks.
subject: [ANN] Repo: JUnit extention for test data repository
